Supply Chain Management
43We have a global supplier network that supports the long- term development of the company. We work 
closely with our suppliers, set governance and performance standards that they are required to meet and 
convey our values through our supply chain

insider -trading policies covering

to meet certain standards and 
monitor supplier compliance 
through multiple channels
